mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM KT.GV_USER WHERE 1 = 1 AND user_id = #{userId} )
SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM KT.GV_GUEST WHERE 1 = 1 AND guest_id = #{guestId} )
SELECT USER_ID FROM GV_USER ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1
SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM KT.GV_USER WHERE 1 = 1 AND mail = #{mail} )

SELECT usr.user_id ,CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(usr.nm),SHA2('a1s2d3f4g5h6j7k8l9!',512)) AS CHAR) AS nm ,CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(usr.mail),SHA2('a1s2d3f4g5h6j7k8l9!',512)) AS CHAR) AS mail ,stat.user_state_code ,stat.user_state FROM KT.GV_USER usr LEFT JOIN KT.GV_USER_STATE stat ON usr.user_id = stat.user_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND mail = #{mail}
SELECT AUTH FROM KT.GV_EMPLOYEE WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_ID = #{userID}
SELECT token , refresh_token , pub_date FROM KT.GV_USER_TOKEN WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY pub_date DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT user_id , user_state_code FROM KT.GV_USER_STATE WHERE user_id = #{userId}
